title: A sermon of predestination preached at Saint Maries in Oxford: by Ri: Crakanthorp.
author: Crakanthorpe, Richard, 1567-1624.
publisher: Printed [by George Purslowe] for Iohn Teage, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Golden Ball,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
